name: Scrollsreplayviewer
tagline: Can be used to view Scrolls Replays in the Browser. Uses SrollsGuide.com-API.
body:
### Scrolls Replay Viewer
This project aims to create an HTML + JS implementation of a [Scrolls](http://scrolls.com) Replay Viewer, to be able to view Replays generated by the [Scrolls Guide](http://www.scrollsguide.com/replays)/[Scrolls Post](http://www.scrollspost.com/replays) Replay Mod.

You can try it [here](replayviewer.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
